11.content: How old are you initially?
11.title: Boy

1222.content: okay so your a 16 year old girl you can drive and have a 2007 Mercades-Benz R350 (BEST PARENTS EVER) but you know all this could change at any time.
1222.title: 14-18(full flower puberty)

12221.content: So do you keep your mind at your actual age or down to current age?
12221.title: The young Mrs. _________________

1222111.content: All of the sudden you are a tiny 1 year old baby. (DAMN IT!) So your mom comes in at the sound of your crying and diapers you. You try to cover yourself up but your mom swats your hand away and says "Oh did little (Lets call you Andrea) Andrea keep her 16 year old mind?" You nod your head yes and then shit yourself. You are totally embarrased. You hate it when this happens. You were born with a terrible disease that causes you to Re/progress randomly. Also you don't always have the mind of the age that you re/progressed to but other times you do. Your mom then changes and breastfeeds you. What happens next?
1222111.title: Baby face but 16 year old mind

12221111.content: Then you actually age into a 8 year old but something happens and you are incontinent and still must breastfeed thus the current moment in your life looks like this http://www.dollymix.tv/breastfeeding.jpg... for some reason your body is different from when you were 8 also. So you are sent to......
12221111.title: A little progression

choices: You shit yourself in front of the class
You get hungry and the teacher breastfeeds you
122211111.content: It's Wendsday so School will start soon. You mom gives you something to wear so you change and look like this http://www.mommymusings.com/downeast-bas... and are sent to your 3rd grade classroom. Unfortunatly since you still had the mind of a 16 year old you knew all this and was totaly bored to death. That is until
122211111.title: Elementery School

1222111111.content: Whilst playing with some kids during recess you feel something smush between your butt cheeks. luckily you remembered to wear a diaper for this occasion. What happens next?
1222111111.title: You shit yourself in front of the class

choices: You arrive at your friends as a  25 year old
You pull over and try to figure out what is going on
12223.content:
You begin to get older. Your name is Kaileen, and you are in the process of driving over to a friend's house when the whole thing starts. You are already 20 years old and you are just halfway to your friends.

"What is with my clothes, they seem tighter somehow, " you complain as you check yourself in the rear view mirror. Something seems off about your looks, but you can't figure out what. You keep on driving though, and
12223.title: Your choice

choices: Create a chamber that changes your age
123.content: You are Alicia Harris and you are in your apartment with your roomates Dave Stevens and Janna Rollins. You are busy in the living room with an experiment for a class, and...

1231.content:
As you stand there observing, in your 22 year old body, you marvel at the machine as Dave who is 23 puts the finishing touches on it.

"There we go," Janna who is also 22 says with a grin.

Dave polishes it up a bit and then steps back as well.

"Looks great, but does it work?" DAve wonders.

"We need to test it," you say, and then...
1231.title: Create a chamber that changes your age

choices: She is made 19 years younger and a 3 year old
She is aged to 50 years old
12311.content:
Janna decided to go into the machine and close the door behind her.

"Okay, so now what happens?" she asled the other two, as they stood outside staring at her.

"Well, I go over to the control pad and tell it whether to make you older or younger, at least I think so, and by how much."

"That sounds easy enough," Janna replied,"so go ahead and do it already."

"I think he wants to know whether you wish to be younger or older and how daring you are feeling," Alicia informed her.

"Oh, just go aheat and surprise me," she told them, so....
12311.title: Janna goes in it

info.brief_description: A world where anyone can AR or AP
info.description:
So in this world people can randomly change their age and the most important choice you make is Weather their minds stay the same or change to match their age. Like a 40 year old woman could regress into a baby and still think like her previous self. or she could think like a baby ect.
Rules: No texting language will be deleted, also no choppy sentences, please write this like you were writing an actual book.
